segments.text: I'm truly taken aback by the woman's unawareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's diligently drying a plate, her expression perfectly neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost commendable how focused she is on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water is gushing out of the sink, right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A substantial puddle has formed, and her foot is right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel the cold water seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel a touch of sadness for her impending realization.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea that mischief is brewing right behind her either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are practically under her nose, stealing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her entire world seems confined to that one plate she's polishing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a peculiar kind of peace, built on complete ignorance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to tap her on the shoulder and point everything out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between her calm and the chaos around her is astonishing.
segments.speaker: PAR
